Name: Ghost of the Seas
About the game: After being dead for a long time, you are now awoken up in mysterious place called Seaworld where the civilizations has now been taken by the Cybernetics. You must find the Harkenon Wheel to escape from Seaworld. Uncover the mystery of Seaworld and search the historical remnants of Seaworld. Explore the world either on foot or using vehicles. Interact with the world of Seaworld. Find the remnants of the past while the story of the game evolved over time. Escape Seaworld. Developed by one person. Note This game only have limited controller support. While the game is playable on controller, some gameplay features is unplayable on console and we highly recommend using mouse & keyboard. Ghost of the Seas is still in pre-alpha stage.
